Kotis Style Guide

  • Ruby
  • CSS
  • Javascript
  • CoffeeScript

Welcome

These guides are general guidelines to use when working with Kotis Design’s codebase.

It’s important to understand that these are “living” documents and are welcome to be discussed, modified, and refined as we continue to learn and grow.

To propose changes to the guide, start a discussion by opening an issue on the kotisdesign/style-guide repository.
